name: Project Cooler
description:
Survive the arctic! Keep your body temperature up! Craft your way out of this frozen wasteland!

Controls: 

WASD -> Move

Q -> Clear Crafting

E -> Craft 

Left Click -> Use Item

Right Click -> Toss Item

Tips: 

- Tools can be used on objects while you are touching them

- Try many combinations of materials to craft cool items!

- find the red gemstone of power

This game was made for the Drexel DGDG Fall 2022 Jam.
